part.narration: Around Yuki looms a crowd. They're all talking to each other, enjoying each other's company, having great conversation, winning at social interaction. Every attempt Yuki makes to approach a person ends in fear. Yuki whispers to herself.
part.line: I'm a game designer, I shouldn't think of shallow terms like "win" and "lose."
But I must play to win, play to win, play to win —
I will speak with a stranger!
part.narration: Yuki makes her approach. Flames burst from the ground, surrounding her.Player cannot escape.
A lonely path opens throughout the flames. Yuki shivers.
part.line: If I touch the fire, I'll die.
part.narration: The player may attempt to walk Yuki to the flame, but it ends with her cowering.Yuki walks through the flame. At the very end — Ganpu. Yuki keeps her distance. Ganpu leans forward.
Ganpu places his palm to his forehead. From there, he covers an eye, fingers spawning a makeshift fringe. From there — his fingers caresses his cheek. Yuki gasps. Yuki mirrors. Flames subside.
Ganpu, palm still on forehead, tips his fingers upward. He flickers his fingers about. Yuki mirrors. She sighs.
